attributes.title: No ❤️
attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible it kept crashing and kicking me out of the app. In the end, I decided to give this app a 1-star rating I would’ve given it a 0-star but that isn't possible. Also, it asked for my location?!? What’s with that huh? Overall this app is a piece of garbage and should be deleted. I would not want anyone else to experience all the trash things I’ve seen on this app. No❤️
